node.title: Online Assessment Platform
node.subtitle: July 2019 - July 2020
node.longerDescription: The Online Assessment Platform is designed to lower workload of teaching assistant and encourage them to spend more time interacting with students, while helping students to debug and check their assignments and labworks before submission. Currently the system will only be supporting auto-grading of Java, C++ and Python assignments, while the next year goal will probably be GUI grading(which I will be leaving the position already). I mainly in charge of designing and implementing the frontend user interface, setting up the backend GraphQL server, writing reflection and linting checking of Java + Python and constructing a Drag-and-Drop test cases creator.
node.lnl: Node.js, React.js, Next.js, Axios, GraphQL, React Bootstrap, React DND, Java, Docker, Python
